marks.terms:
Unless otherwise stated above, for this offer to be valid, the cardmember shall:
(1) pay with a Diners Club or any card within the partner network which is mutually agreed upon, in writing by the parties;
(2) show the offer in print or mobile phone; and
(3) if explicitly required by the merchant, enter the promotional code if purchasing online.
Only one offer per cardmember can be used and cannot be combined with any other offer, unless otherwise stated. This offer is non-refundable, transferable and carries no monetary alternative.
marks.name: Diners Club Acceptance Mark

offer_settings.terms: <p>Kazbek is a new restaurant of authentic Georgian cuisine. This project is implementation of your best impressions about Georgian holidays: sunny mood, kindness and hospitality of people, tasty home-made cooking. This is an atmospheric Georgian apartment: lots of natural light, artfully made old walls, carved wooden screens, textured floors, but the main thing &#8211; a huge,  real wood-burning stove, in which khachapuri and bread are baked, and windows facing directly into the kitchen of the restaurant, where all the processes led by the young blue-eyed Tbilisi chef Mamiya Jojua together with his mother.</p>
